decisions.name: DoesTheUserAlreadyHaveAPermSet
decisions.label: Does The User Already Have A PermSet?

Flow.description: Added value to nickname to avoid Nickname already in use

formulas.name: varF_ProfileNameCreateUser
formulas.expression: IF({!Admin_user} = true, IF( {!Peut_cr_er_des_tickets2} = true, "Customer Community Login Admin", "Customer Community Login Reader") , "Customer Community Login User")

formulas.name: varF_ProfileNameUpdateUser
formulas.expression: IF({!Copy_2_of_Admin_user} = true, IF( {!Peut_cr_er_des_tickets} = true, "Customer Community Login Admin", "Customer Community Login Reader") , "Customer Community Login User")
